stories.summary: State police are investigating the death of a woman found in her Skowhegan home on Saturday morning. Authorities have not yet released the victim's identity or details on the cause of death.
A fresh blanket of snow covered much of Maine today, creating picturesque winter landscapes from Portland to Bangor. Travel remains slow but steady as road crews continue to clear primary routes.
